sub_title: Freelance Business Management Consultant / Interim CFO
summary:
Available for (interim) positions re. CFO/Finance Director/Project Manager

Wide experience in FMCG, acting as CFO in various countries (esp emerging markets, Central Europe, Africa)
Specialties: HANDS ON APPROACH
Achieve operational excellence in Finance
Create Management Information Systems
Design and implementation of Internal Control Frameworks
Act as Business Partner
